docstring:
/**
     *  For x between 0 and pi/4 compute cosine using Talor series
     *  cos(x) = 1 - x^2/2! + x^4/4! ...
     * @param x number from which cosine is requested
     * @param result placeholder where to put the result in extended precision
     * (may be null)
     * @return cos(x)
     */
